description: This script sets up multiple agent configurations for a playground environment, including web, finance, and YouTube agents, using various tools and storage backends, and then exposes an application for serving these agents.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent with specific tools, instructions, and storage.

classes.name: xAI
classes.description: Represents an explainable AI model configuration.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: A class to configure and serve a playground environment for agents.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of agent data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for searching the web via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for retrieving financial data from Yahoo Finance.

classes.name: YouTubeTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with YouTube videos and captions.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the FastAPI application instance for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Runs the server to host the playground application.
